patthana17.23:1.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.23:2.1: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.23:3.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.23:4.1: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naupādinnupādāniyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
